name: Dodge and Touch
description:
Dodge and Touch is a simple minimalist game that will test your skills in dodging enemies, how fast can you tap to avoid your enemies while touching as many walls as you can to earn more scores.

With the help of powerups, you can either be invisible to them, slow them down, or smash your enemies depending on the color of the powerups you got!

Collect the bonus moving wall points to make your scores to the highest!

Just tap your screen left or right to jump, How long can you survive this game?
